title: About this App
pageContent:
To learn more about the team behind OCTcases see the About Us page.
**App developed by:** [Jeremy Moreau](https://jeremymoreau.com) For questions, suggestions, or bug reports about this app send an email to: Jeremy Moreau (tap to reveal email)
Issues and pull requests are also welcome on the project GitHub: [github.com/jeremymoreau/OCTcases](https://github.com/jeremymoreau/OCTcases) ### Open Source Acknowledgments * [core-js (MIT)](https://github.com/zloirock/core-js) * [Ionic Framework (MIT)](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-framework) * [Marked (MIT)](https://github.com/markedjs/marked) * [netlify-cms (MIT)](https://github.com/netlify/netlify-cms) * [register-service-worker (MIT)](https://github.com/yyx990803/register-service-worker) * [Viewer.js (MIT)](https://github.com/fengyuanchen/viewerjs) * [Vue (MIT)](https://github.com/vuejs/vue-next) * [Vue-gtag (MIT)](https://github.com/MatteoGabriele/vue-gtag) * [Vue Router (MIT)](https://github.com/vuejs/vue-router-next)
